description: Parker London walks through the cemetery on Halloween night with a shovel. He's looking to rob a fresh grave. Parker nervously looks around then digs one up. He finds a nice watch but Brenn Wyson, the owner is not letting it go so easily. Brenn strips Parker naked and straps the screaming boy to his coffin. Parker is made to suck cock and receives a hard gut punching. With supernatural power, Brenn hogties the boy on the altar and fucks him hard. He beats the boy into submission with the flogger. Crazy Brenn buries Parker's head in the dirt and fucks him some more. Parker is screaming for mercy but no one can hear him in the dark cemetery on Halloween night.
title: The Grave Robber - Halloween Update
